articles.title: Exclusive: Inaudible sound might be the next frontier in wildfire defense - TechCrunch

articles.description: Pixnapping side-channel can steal 2FA codes pixel-by-pixel on Android 13–16; CVE-2025-48561 patched Sept 2025 but workaround exists.
